RuleCharNumber: This many samples have more than 100 characters.
RuleWordNumber: This many samples have between 20 and 100,000 words.
RuleSentenceNumber: This many samples have between 3 and 7,500 sentences.
RuleLineEndWithTerminal: Over 60% of sentences in this many samples end with terminal punctuation (.!?;).
RuleStopWord: Less than 6% of words in this many samples are stop words.
RuleAlphaWords: Over 60% of the words in this many samples have alphabetic characters.
RuleMeanWordLength: This many samples have a mean word length between 3 and 10 characters.
RuleCapitalWords: Over 20% of words in this many samples are not  capitalised.
RuleLineEndWithEllipsis: Over 30% of sentences in this many samples don't end with ellipsis (...).
RuleContentNull: This many samples are not empty.
RuleSpecialCharacter: This many samples don't have special characters.
RuleLineStartWithBulletpoint: This many samples don't start with a bullet point.
RuleDocRepeat: This many samples don't have repeating lines.
RuleSymbolWordRatio: In this many samples, the ratio between symbols and words is <= 0.4.
RuleHtmlEntity: This many samples don't have HTML content.
RuleUniqueWords: This many samples have a ratio <= 0.1 of unique words.
RuleCurlyBracket: There is a ratio <= 0.1 between curly brackets and other characters in this many samples.
RuleLoremIpsum: This many samples don't contain Lorem Ipsum text.
RuleColonEnd: This many samples don't finish in a colon (:).
RuleLineJavascriptCount: This many samples don't contain the word "javascript".
